about.title: Diamond Needles
about.description: DIAMOND ENGRAVING NEEDLE for sale with different stone weights and needle configurations. Handmade needles have a stone size of only 0.03ct. We work with drawings. We are engaged in sharpening of the tool 20 UAH/needle. And also we produce diamond scribers, nozzles NK1 Rockwell. We make a tool for drawing a picture on the surface of a stone (usually for the production of monuments). I will send any quantity to any place, in any way convenient for you, by prepayment to any payment system, from Vinnitsa Ukraine. For communication, use the number - Vitaliy. Communication via Telegram, WhatsApp, Viber. Ready to consider any suggestions.

delivery.title: Order and Delivery
delivery.description: For delivery and payment inquiries, please contact our customer service
